Articles.Content:
Hello

So since good old ScienceAlert isn't supported anymore, I searched for something that could do it's job.

I've come across For Science, but it's not showing up in-game, never. Not in the toolbar, not in blizzy78's toolbar, not in any menu or options.

The pathing is correct at KSP/GameData/ForScience, the .dll is in there.

I've tried installing it both manually and through CKAN. I've tried running KSP as admin, Steam as admin, both, I've tried with a fresh install of KSP. I'm running out of ideas.

KSP AVC don't list it either.Any help?
